original_text: And, behold, I send the promise of my Father upon you: but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem, until ye be endued with power from on high.
korean_text: 볼지어다 내가 내 아버지께서 약속하신 것을 너희에게 보내리니 너희는 위로부터 능력으로 입혀질 때까지 이 성에 머물라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: I send the promise of my Father upon you
but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem
until ye be endued with power from on high
